Introduction

Welcome

The Signal-Viewer (SViewer) is a part of the BIOSIG-toolbox (http://biosig.sf.net). This software package should run on Matlab without toolboxes. This program is free software. Features

At the moment the software consists of the following parts:

  • The Signal-Viewer supports various signal formats

    • EDF, BKR, BDF, CNT, EEG, etc.

  • A tool for manual detection and for editing different events

    • EEG artifact, EEG patterns, ECG events, etc.

  • Loading and Saving of the events
